channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 中国誓言要建立其认为对未来竞争力至关重要的产业，从人工智能到太空，同时提出放开制造业和一些服务业的准入，以阻止外国投资者的撤退。更多内容请点击这里：
item.description:
China vowed to build up industries it sees as crucial to future competitiveness, ranging from artificial intelligence to space, while offering to free up access to manufacturing and some services sectors to stem a retreat by foreign investors. More here: https://t.co/E3c3bArNkN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 一些大型中国开发商将在英国出售更多房地产以筹集现金，房地产中介称，这将充分利用缓慢解冻的市场和押注经济复苏的买家。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Some big Chinese developers are set to offload more real estate in Britain to raise cash, property agents say, making the most of a slowly thawing market and buyers betting on a recovery. More here: https://t.co/Nk2z5SVnFG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：特斯拉 2 月份在中国的销量下降，股价下跌超过 7%。
item.description:
WATCH: Shares in Tesla fell more than 7% after its sales declined in February in China, where it faces growing competition from local rivals like BYD https://t.co/D28nXm31or pic.twitter.com/ZzaML000PU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 强于预期的美国经济正在提振美元，这让那些押注美元将在一连串降息措施下萎靡不振的投资者感到沮丧。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A stronger-than-expected US economy is buoying the dollar, frustrating investors who had bet the currency would wilt under a barrage of interest rate cuts that have yet to materialize. More here: https://t.co/HMogt4eyLN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 波音公司可能收购 Spirit AeroSystems 公司，同时推迟 737 MAX 喷气式飞机的增产计划，这将有助于该飞机制造商管理其供应链，但分析师表示，此举并不能快速解决其质量问题。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Boeing's possible takeover of Spirit AeroSystems, along with delaying plans to ramp up production of 737 MAX jets, could help the planemaker manage its supply chain, but the move is no quick fix for its quality problems, analysts said. More here: https://t.co/B5vpIoumVq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 泰雷兹利润增长，应对电信卫星市场疲软
item.description:
Thales posts higher profit, tackles weak telecom satellite market https://t.co/jW3zTNMxmJ pic.twitter.com/aVAXwZBO0y

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 南非银行 Nedbank 年度利润增长 11
item.description:
South African lender Nedbank posts 11% rise in annual profit https://t.co/8usiBtOWJk pic.twitter.com/eTM76tHvpX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：由维托（Vitol）支持的储能公司 VTTI 即将从埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）和卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）手中收购意大利最大液化天然气进口终端的多数股权。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Vitol-backed energy storage company VTTI is close to acquiring a majority stake in Italy's biggest liquefied natural gas import terminal from Exxon Mobil and QatarEnergy. More here: https://t.co/anFV9tuuaN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会进一步推迟就贝莱德现货以太坊 ETF 作出决定
item.description:
US SEC further delays decision on BlackRock's spot ethereum ETF https://t.co/rYTVgC7Kr9 pic.twitter.com/TJw2bdfG6W

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 稳定币 Tether 的代币流通量突破 1000 亿美元
item.description:
Stablecoin Tether crosses $100 billion tokens in circulation https://t.co/fn9KHvXGtE pic.twitter.com/lm0Sr37MsO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：由于投资者在经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔国会证词公布前稍作停顿，美国股市在一个波澜不惊的交易日后小幅收跌
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended slightly lower after a choppy trading day as investors took a pause ahead of economic data and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's congressional testimony https://t.co/rP85i19ovB pic.twitter.com/K3UjxB6G58

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 日本僵尸企业面临清算
item.description:
Breakingviews - Japan faces a reckoning with its zombie companies https://t.co/zYa0FfF7F4 https://t.co/zYa0FfF7F4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 随着资金不断涌入这种市值最大的加密货币，比特币一度达到两年来的峰值，突破了 68600 美元，并逼近历史最高点。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Bitcoin was perched at a two-year peak, breaking above $68,600 and stalking the all-time high as money keeps rushing into the largest cryptocurrency by market value. More here: https://t.co/XB13VL4XrJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 越南有史以来最大的金融诈骗案于本周二开庭审理，近 90 名被告被指控参与了 120 亿美元的诈骗案，其中一些人可能因此被判处死刑。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The trial in Vietnam's largest financial fraud case on record begins on Tuesday, with nearly 90 defendants accused of being part of a $12 billion scam, for which some of them risk the death penalty. More here: https://t.co/ZUkZyI9lYu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据两名研究人员称，一个深受网络犯罪分子欢迎的黑客论坛上的帖子声称，联合健康公司支付了 2200 万美元，以恢复对被 "黑猫 "勒索软件团伙加密的数据和系统的访问。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A post on a hacker forum popular with cybercriminals has claimed UnitedHealth paid $22 million in a bid to recover access to data and systems encrypted by the ‘Blackcat’ ransomware gang, according to two researchers. More here: https://t.co/9ErUJc1aC5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 国务院总理李强表示，中国今年的经济增长目标将是5%左右，同时努力转变发展模式，抑制工业产能过剩，化解房地产行业风险，减少地方政府的浪费性支出。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
China will target economic growth of around 5% this year as it works to transform its development model, curb industrial overcapacity, defuse property sector risks and cut wasteful spending by local governments, Premier Li Qiang said. More here: https://t.co/xDwu86rYVR

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 日本僵尸企业面临清算
item.description:
Breakingviews - Japan faces a reckoning with its zombie companies https://t.co/roDBfuTFAm https://t.co/roDBfuTFAm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔本周的国会证词以及周五的重要就业报告公布之前，华尔街的主要指数略有喘息
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street's main indexes took a bit of a breather ahead of congressional testimony this week from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell as well as Friday's key jobs report https://t.co/rP85i18QG3 pic.twitter.com/Sb97qMPaoD

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

US SEC further delays decision on BlackRock's spot ethereum ETF https://t.co/4N7vausYwW pic.twitter.com/Wh6sblzrFb

item.title: 观看：捷蓝航空（JetBlue）和精神航空（Spirit Airlines）的合并计划已永久搁浅。这两家低成本航空公司放弃了这项价值 38 亿美元的交易，因为在两个月前美国法官阻止了合并之后，它们看不到前进的道路。
item.description:
WATCH: The proposed merger between JetBlue and Spirit Airlines has been permanently grounded. The low-cost carriers scrapped the $3.8 billion dollar deal, seeing no path forward after a US judge blocked the merger two months ago https://t.co/M9aZXrjuU4 pic.twitter.com/IegTUQM8bG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 稳定币 Tether 的代币流通量突破 1000 亿美元
item.description:
Stablecoin Tether crosses $100 billion tokens in circulation https://t.co/JGWRgqT1MX pic.twitter.com/YBTdjbltRP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国领先的电动汽车制造商比亚迪推出了其最畅销汽车的新版本，价格低于停产的前代车型的最终售价，全球最大的汽车市场正掀起一场价格战。
item.description:
WATCH: China's leading EV maker BYD launched a new version of its best-selling car at a price lower than the final price of its discontinued predecessor, as a price war rages in the world's largest automobile market https://t.co/6lS0HjwxYw pic.twitter.com/nm5ySr0QPW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 再次向首席运营官问好
item.description:
Breakingviews - Say hello again to the chief operating officer https://t.co/AQQnJNbC0X https://t.co/AQQnJNbC0X

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 观看：布鲁塞尔对苹果公司处以 18.4 亿欧元（20 亿美元）的罚款，原因是苹果通过限制其 App Store 来阻挠音乐流媒体竞争对手的竞争，这是这家 iPhone 制造商有史以来首次因违反欧盟规则而受到处罚。
item.description:
WATCH: Brussels fined Apple 1.84 billion euros ($2 billion) for thwarting competition from music-streaming rivals via restrictions on its App Store, the iPhone maker's first-ever penalty for breaching EU rules https://t.co/g7hYKZ7b53 pic.twitter.com/gq132RuAbZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 瑞士报告呼吁央行聘请外部人士担任下任主席
item.description:
Swiss report calls on central bank to hire outsider as next chairman https://t.co/yvZs1A7LXE pic.twitter.com/V7GLuR7ja2

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 联合国称非洲到 2030 年气候融资将短缺 2.5 万亿美元
item.description:
Africa to be $2.5 trillion short of climate finance by 2030, UN says https://t.co/cSf8lmPuy2 pic.twitter.com/jKbAplocgV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 观看：低成本航空运营商捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）和精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）取消了价值 38 亿美元的合并协议，在美国法官于今年 1 月以反竞争为由阻止该交易后，这两家公司已看不到前进的道路。
item.description:
WATCH: Low-cost air carriers JetBlue Airways and Spirit Airlines canceled their $3.8 billion merger agreement, seeing no path forward after a US judge blocked the deal in January on anti-competition concerns https://t.co/M9aZXriX4w pic.twitter.com/GPJR6ed2gQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 内部控制问题损害投资者信任，纽约商业银行股价恢复下滑
item.description:
NYCB shares resume slide as internal control issues hurt investor trust https://t.co/3rnHTAE3lC pic.twitter.com/SirpnwM8Uc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪推出了其最畅销汽车元加跨界车的新版本，在海外市场被称为Atto 3，售价为16,644美元。这比它所取代的版本的最终销售价格降低了11.8%。
item.description:
WATCH: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD launched a new version of its best-selling car, the Yuan Plus crossover known as the Atto 3 in overseas markets, at $16,644. That is 11.8% lower than the final sales price of the version it has replaced https://t.co/6lS0HjwxYw pic.twitter.com/uIy8udD18J

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024
